POR_QUE_CONFIGURAR: Why do i need to do this configuration?
CONECTE_PARA_IDENTIFICAR: Before proceeding, you need to connect to the Tholz network for the app to identify your device.
REDE_THOLZ_IDENTIFICADA: The Tholz network is identified by name
PRIVACIDADE_CLIQUE_PARA_ACEITAR: Your privacy is important to us. It is Tholz's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information collected in our app. By clicking "Accept", you declare that you have read, understood and fully accepted the contents of this document.
POR_QUE_A_REDE_WIFI_NAO_PODE_SER_5G: Why can't the Wi-Fi network be 5G?
WIFI_NAO_PODE_SER_5G: Due to its greater range and availability, Tholz Casa Inteligente app compatible devices work on 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi networks, there are routers that work in both frequency bands, if that is your case, the Tholz device will automatically connect to the frequency 2.4 GHz.

PROBLEMAS_CONEXAO_VERIFICA_INTERNET: Make sure your smartphone has internet access and try again, if the problem persists, contact us.
CONEXAO_PERDIDA_INATIVIDADE:
Your internet connection has been lost or your session has expired.
Click in "Reconnect" to return to the main screen.
DESCRICAO_OPERACAO: For the correct functioning of your heating system, leave the operating mode in Automatic. In periods when the pool is not used, you can keep the operating mode off. On mode must be used to force water to circulate in the system.
DESCRICAO_TEMP_DESEJ_1: When it reaches the desired temperature, your heating system will turn off. It will turn on after the temperature drops below the differential configured in the device.
DESCRICAO_TEMP_DESEJ_2: Example: If the desired temperature is 27¬∫C, the moment the water reaches this temperature, the heating system will turn off. Assuming that the temperature differential set in the device is 2¬∫C, the heating system will turn on again when the temperature is lower than 25¬∫C.
DESCRICAO_TEMP_DESEJ_3: The recommended temperature for residential pools is between 27¬∞C and 29¬∞C.
ERRO_AQUECIMENTO_CONTEUDO: The device's temperature sensor has identified an inappropriate reading. Check sensor location and installation.
REDIRECIONAR: Your username has not been verified, please click the button to be redirected.
CONTA_VERIFICADA_PROXIMO_PASSO: Your account has been verified, now you will need to enter the code sent to your e-mail for password recovery
ATUALIZACAO_CONTEUDO: We have identified that your device has an update available. Wait a few more minutes, until the update is complete, to use your device normally.
ERRO_CONTEUDO_1: The solar collector temperature sensor detected a high value. To avoid any damage to the piping, water circulation will be avoided.
ERRO_CONTEUDO_2: The solar collector temperature sensor has detected a value that is too low. To avoid any damage to the piping, the water circulation will be activated.
ERRO_CONTEUDO_3: The device level sensor has identified that there is no water in the bathtub. For safety, no whirlpool can be activated. Check that the equipment is calibrated.
ERRO_CONTEUDO_4: The whirlpool will remain on for a few more seconds, until the resistance has cooled down. Do not turn off the output during this period.
ERRO_CONTEUDO_5: The device's temperature sensor has identified an improper reading. Check the location of the sensor and its installation.
ERRO_CONTEUDO_6: The thermostat identified an overheat. To avoid any damage to the system, the water heating has been disabled.
ERRO_CONTEUDO_8: The heat from the system is not being absorbed by the water, causing overheating. Check the water flow rate of the system.
ERRO_CONTEUDO_9: A low pressure in the refrigerant gas has been identified. This can occur after the first start of the pump or by a low ambient temperature.
ERRO_CONTEUDO_10: Check the cleanliness of the filter system, the pump, and the position of the equipment's water registers.
ERRO_CONTEUDO_11: The defrost cycle was activated due to the identification of a low ambient temperature.
ATUALIZACAO_IDIOMA_CONTEUDO: Your language has been updated on our server. If you have devices added to Alexa and/or Google Assistant, their names may have changed.
PRODUTO_JA_ADICIONADO_CONTENT: The device you are trying to add is already in your device list.
REINICIE_O_APLICATIVO: Close and open the application again to apply the changes.
ATUALIZE_O_APLICATIVO: Your app is out of date. Update to continue.

COMPARTILHAR_CONVITE_DESCRICAO:
Send the invitation to users with whom you want to share your devices and customizations. They will be redirected to the app to proceed with adding the devices.

This invitation has a maximum duration of 12 hours and can be used by more than one user.
PRODUTOS_ADICIONADOS_DESCRICAO: The devices indicated below were added to your account through device sharing, including their customizations (names and icons) given by the user who generated the invitation.
CONVITE_INVALIDO_CONTEUDO: The device sharing invitation has already expired. Request a new invite so you can gain access to the devices.
PRODUTO_NAO_ENCONTRADO_CONTEUDO: One or more devices could not be found to share. After the device list has been updated, select them again.

ALTERACAO_REDE_WIFI_DESCRICAO: Change the Wi-Fi network of a device that is already in your device list.
MODO_DE_CONFIGURACAO_INSTRUCAO: Press the device configuration button for 5 seconds, as per the manual. After pressing, click ‚ÄúNext‚Äù.
VERIFIQUE_O_INDICADOR_INSTRUCAO: In Setup Mode, make sure the device's Wi-Fi indicator is blinking orange. If yes, click on ‚Äúsearch‚Äù.
SELECIONE_UMA_REDE_INSTRUCAO: Select one of the networks found by your device. Do not add 5G networks to connect.
HARDWARE_NAO_IDENTIFICADO_DESCRICAO: Unable to identify your device's Wi-Fi network. Select ‚ÄúSearch Again‚Äù to try a new search, or if you want to proceed with the manual connection to the device, press ‚ÄúManual Connection‚Äù.
